stepAnswer: 4 pounds of macadamia nuts and 8 pounds almonds
stepTitle: Macario is making 12 pounds of nut mixture with macadamia nuts and almonds. Macadamia nuts cost $9 per pound and almonds cost $5.25 per pound. How many pounds of macadamia nuts and how many pounds of almonds should Macario use for the mixture to cost $6.50 per pound to make?
choices: 4 pounds of macadamia nuts and 8 pounds almonds
2 pounds of macadamia nuts and 9 pounds almonds
3 pounds of macadamia nuts and 6 pounds almonds
12 pounds of macadamia nuts and 3 pounds almonds
